{"$schema":"http://adaptivecards.io/schemas/adaptive-card.json","type":"AdaptiveCard","version":"1.2","body":[{"type":"TextBlock","size":"Medium","weight":"Bolder","text":"Candidate Feedback Form Interview Score üìÑ‚úç","horizontalAlignment":"Center","wrap":true},{"type":"TextBlock","text":"Please use this form as a guide to evaluate the candidate's qualification for employment. Rating Scale: 

5 - Exceptional

4 - Exceeds Expectations

3 - Meets Expectations

2 - Below Expectations

","id":"Education","errorMessage":"This is a required question","style":"expanded","isRequired":true},{"type":"TextBlock","text":"Technical Competency: Assess the candidate's Technical knowledge and past working experiences. ","wrap":true},{"type":"Input.ChoiceSet","choices":[{"title":"Exceptional","value":"5"},{"title":"Exceeds Expectations","value":"4"},{"title":"Meets Expectations","value":"3"},{"title":"Below Expectations","value":"2"},{"title":"Does not fit or Not Applicable","value":"1"}],"placeholder":"Choose","id":"TechCompetency","label":"Technical Competency: Assess the candidate's Technical knowledge and past working experiences.","isRequired":true,"errorMessage":"This is a required question"},{"type":"TextBlock","text":"Presentation / Communication / Verbal Skills: Assess the candidate's fluency of expression, ability to express ideas and thoughts clearly.","wrap":true},{"type":"Input.ChoiceSet","choices":[{"title":"Exceptional","value":"5"},{"title":"Exceeds Expectations","value":"4"},{"title":"Meets Expectations","value":"3"},{"title":"Below Expectations","value":"2"},{"title":"Does not fit or Not Applicable","value":"1"}],"placeholder":"Choose","label":"Presentation / Communication / Verbal Skills: Assess the candidate's fluency of expression, ability to express ideas and thoughts clearly. ","wrap":true},{"type":"Input.ChoiceSet","choices":[{"title":"Exceptional ","value":"5"},{"title":"Exceeds Expectations","value":"4"},{"title":"Meets Expectations","value":"3"},{"title":"Below Expectations","value":"2"},{"title":"Does not fit or Not Applicable","value":"1"}],"placeholder":"Choose","label":"Intellectual / Practical Ability: Assess the candidate's ability to appreciate new situation quickly and accurately, depth and consistency of argument.","isRequired":true,"errorMessage":"This is a required question","id":"Intellect"},{"type":"TextBlock","text":"Non-Academic Activities: Assess the candidate's diversity of activities, level of participation, vocational training (if applicable).","wrap":true},{"type":"Input.ChoiceSet","choices":[{"title":"Exceptional","value":"5"},{"title":"Exceeds Expectations","value":"4"},{"title":"Meets Expecations","value":"3"},{"title":"Below Expectations","value":"2"},{"title":"Does not fit or Not Applicable","value":"1"}],"placeholder":"Choose","label":"Non-Academic Activities: Assess the candidate's diversity of activities, level of participation, vocational training (if applicable).","isRequired":true,"errorMessage":"This is a required question","id":"NonAcad"},{"type":"TextBlock","text":"Achievement Motivation: Assess the candidate's target setting, track-record in overcoming difficulties, drive and enthusiasm.","wrap":true},{"type":"Input.ChoiceSet","choices":[{"title":"Exceptional","value":"5"},{"title":"Exceeds Expectations","value":"4"},{"title":"Meets Expectations","value":"3"},{"title":"Below Expectations","value":"2"},{"title":"Does not fit or Not Applicable","value":"1"}],"placeholder":"Choose","label":"Achievement Motivation: Assess the candidate's target setting, track-record in overcoming difficulties, drive and enthusiasm. ","id":"AchievementMotivation","isRequired":true,"errorMessage":"This is a required questions"},{"type":"TextBlock","text":"Organisational / Cultural Fit: Assess the candidate's to fit in the organisation and culture","wrap":true},{"type":"Input.ChoiceSet","choices":[{"title":"Exceptional","value":"5"},{"title":"Exceeds Expectations","value":"4"},{"title":"Meets Applicable","value":"1"}],"placeholder":"Choose","id":"Organization","isRequired":true,"errorMessage":"This is a required question","label":"Organisational / Cultural Fit: Assess the candidate's to Percentage % Score = Total Score/40 * 100 %","wrap":true},{"type":"Input.Number","placeholder":"Your answer","id":"totalPercScore"},{"type":"TextBlock","text":"General Assessment / Recommendation ","wrap":true},{"type":"Input.Text","style":"text","isMultiline":true,"id":"GenAssess","isRequired":true,"errorMessage":"This is a required field","label":"General Assessment / Recommendation "},{"type":"TextBlock","text":"Decision","wrap":true},{"type":"Input.ChoiceSet","choices":[{"title":"Hire","value":"Hire ‚úÖ"},{"title":"No Hire","value":"No Hire ‚ùå"}],"placeholder":"Choose","style":"expanded","id":"Decision"},{"type":"TextBlock","wrap":true,"text":"Suggest follow-up discussion regarding:"},{"type":"Input.ChoiceSet","choices":[{"title":"Past experience in the topic area","value":"Past experience in the topic area üòé"},{"title":"Inclusive behaviours and work ethics","value":"Inclusive behaviours and work ethics üëî"},{"title":"Ability to work without supervision","value":"Ability to work without supervision ü™ê"}],"placeholder":"Select","isMultiSelect":true,"style":"expanded","id":"Suggestion"}],"actions":[{"type":"Action.Submit","title":"Submit","data":{"id":"1234567890"}},{"type":"Action.ShowCard","title":"Show Card","card":{"type":"AdaptiveCard","body":[{"type":"TextBlock","text":"Enter comment","wrap":true},{"type":"Input.Text","style":"text","id":"CommentVal"}],"actions":[{"type":"Action.Submit","title":"OK"}],"$schema":"http://adaptivecards.io/schemas/adaptive-card.json"}}],"-ms-tokens":{}}

parameters.body/body/content:
New Feedback Form Submitted

Submitted by:@{triggerBody()?['entity']?['teamsFlowRunContext']?['messagePayload']?['from']?['user']?['displayName']}

Responder details:

Name:  @{triggerBody()?['entity']?['teamsFlowRunContext']?['messagePayload']?['from']?['user']?['displayName']},
Candidate's Name: @{triggerBody()?['entity']?['cardOutputs']?['candidateName']},
Position: @{triggerBody()?['entity']?['cardOutputs']?['post']},

Competencies Result:
Experience and Employment History: @{triggerBody()?['entity']?['cardOutputs']?['bgrd']},
Education/Training:@{triggerBody()?['entity']?['cardOutputs']?['education']}  ,
Technical Competency: @{triggerBody()?['entity']?['cardOutputs']?['techCompetency']} ,
Presentation/Comm/Verbal: @{triggerBody()?['entity']?['cardOutputs']?['preComVerb']}  ,
Intellectual/Practical Ability: @{triggerBody()?['entity']?['cardOutputs']?['intellect']} ,
Diversity ability: @{triggerBody()?['entity']?['cardOutputs']?['nonAcad']} ,
Achievement Motivation: @{triggerBody()?['entity']?['cardOutputs']?['achievementMotivation']} ,
Organization/Cultural Fit: @{triggerBody()?['entity']?['cardOutputs']?['organization']},

Decision: @{triggerBody()?['entity']?['cardOutputs']?['decision']},


Suggestions for follow-up discussions:

@{triggerBody()?['entity']?['cardOutputs']?['suggestion']}
